table_description: WorkflowRun represents a repository action workflow run

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the workflow run.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the workflow run.

columns.name: head_branch
columns.description: Branch for which the workflow was run.

columns.name: head_sha
columns.description: SHA of the head commit of the workflow run.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the workflow run (e.g., queued, in_progress, completed).

columns.name: conclusion
columns.description: Conclusion of the workflow run (e.g., success, failure, neutral).

columns.name: html_url
columns.description: HTML URL of the workflow run.

columns.name: workflow_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the workflow.

columns.name: run_number
columns.description: Run number of the workflow.

columns.name: event
columns.description: Event that triggered the workflow run.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the workflow run was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the workflow run was last updated.

columns.name: run_attempt
columns.description: Attempt number of the workflow run.

columns.name: run_started_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the workflow run started.

columns.name: actor
columns.description: Details of the actor who triggered the workflow run.

columns.name: head_commit
columns.description: Details of the head commit associated with the workflow run.

columns.name: repository
columns.description: Details of the repository where the workflow run was executed.

columns.name: head_repository
columns.description: Details of the head repository associated with the workflow run.

columns.name: referenced_workflows
columns.description: Referenced workflows in the workflow run.

columns.name: artifact_count
columns.description: Number of artifacts generated in the workflow run.

columns.name: artifacts
columns.description: Details of the artifacts generated in the workflow run.
